portfolio.title: Witchie
portfolio.description: Witchie is a game that defies the player's abilities to solve complex puzzles while immersing themselves on the Witchie's lore. I worked as Front-End and Game developer in SwiftUI, following the MVVM architecture, and implemented and improved versioning and conflict management skills in GitHub.

portfolio.title: EyeChat
portfolio.description: EyeChat is a conversation app designed for people with physical limitations. It uses eye tracking to generate user interactions solely through the detection of the user's eye movements. I worked as Front-End Developer in SwiftUI, following the MVVM architecture, and also as a PM, implementing agile methodologies throughout the whole project

portfolio.title: Vibefy
portfolio.description: Vibefy is an iPhone app that suggests bars and restaurants around the metropolitan region of Recife based on your Apple Music history, and it aims to recommend places that align with your mood at any moment. I worked in Front-End and data management, creating the model that compiles all restaurants and its informations.

testimonial.description: Working closely with Guilherme at the Apple Developer Academy was a privilege. He stands out as a proactive developer, always willing to take on responsibilities and support the team's needs. His eagerness to share knowledge extends beyond his team, benefiting everyone who seeks his guidance. Pair programming with him during the project solidified my programming fundamentals with his valuable support. Besides his active contribution, Guilherme isn't hesitant to seek help when needed, always eager to learn and find solutions. His demeanor fosters a collaborative, enriching, and positive work environment. I have complete confidence that his dedication, technical skills, and readiness for challenges make him a valuable asset to any team.

It's with great pleasure that I recommend Guilherme. I had the privilege of working with him on an TDD assignment in Swift, and he stood out as an exceptional team member, showing dedication, curiosity, and proactivity at every stage of the project. His expertise in code development was crucial in achieving the final result, and his creative and innovative contribution left a significant mark. Guilherme is also admired, respected, and beloved in our internship environment. His work, technical skills, and willingness to help others are recognized by everyone. I greatly admire Guilherme and he will surely continue to achieve success in his professional career. I recommend him without hesitation as a talented and valuable professional.

With fondness, I mention the latest project I participated in with Guilherme, where we built a MacOS app from its conception. Guilherme's light, comfortable, and non-violent communication was a crucial highlight for the project; his teamwork skills are valuable. In the context of this short-term project, requiring continuous deliveries, his mastery and agility with SwiftUI were a differential! The best part is being able to count on his active participation in all stages of the process, from refining the idea to creating and launching an MVP, resulting in a praised app! Guilherme demonstrated interdisciplinary skills, creativity, and commitment. I am confident that, faced with any proposed challenge, he will deliver an excellent result!
